# MKZoomScale

**Type Alias**

A scale factor to use in conjunction with a map.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias MKZoomScale = CGFloat
```

## Types

- **MKRoadWidthAtZoomScale(_:)**: Returns the width (in screen points) of roads on a map at the specified zoom level.

items.description: Returns the width (in screen points) of roads on a map at the specified zoom level.
items.name: MKRoadWidthAtZoomScale(_:)
